Steps to reproduce:

Bug 429484 fixed nsILocalFile.exists() but isDirectory() and other isXxx methods still fail (throws NS_ERROR_FILE_IS_LOCKED) for existing system files. I would assume that isXxx methods should not fail for existing files.

Attached test case fails for me in win7+ff9. Only exists(), isSymlink() and isWritable() succeed, others throw an NS_ERROR_FILE_IS_LOCKED.
